name: Open World RPG (will jobst)
description:
Let's hop in the car and just drive around.

In Open World RPG, we all get in the car and go for a drive. This roadtrip is played through a shared Google street view screen, a shared playlist, and voice chat. It’s a small, comfy, hangout-able game. 

We’re just ourselves, in the car, goofing off. 

It lasts as long as you want, usually twenty minutes to an hour long. Open World RPG is a game for two to ten players, with the sweet spot being however many people can share a group call without stepping over toes.

This game is about enjoying the sights and the trip, just as much as it’s about enjoying the destination. Get lost, wander around, take any path you wish! 

Credits

Game design by Adam Vass and Will Jobst
Writing by Will Jobst
Layout by Adam Vass
Thanks to seb pines and Adam Bell for help playtesting and their feedback.
